```{r}
data = read.csv('Math 1B 2023 Fatalities.csv',header = TRUE)
dim(data)
Dayweek = data$Dayweek
Gender = data$Gender

data1 = table(Gender, Dayweek)
data1

barplot(data1[-c(1, 3, 5, 6), ], main = "Fatalities by Day of the Week and Gender",
    xlab = "Day of the week", col = c("lightblue", "lightgreen"), legend = rownames(data1[-c(1,
        3, 5, 6), ]), beside = TRUE)
```
